title: 2018 Masters (snooker)
summary: The 2018 Masters (also referred to as the 2018 Dafabet Masters for the purposes of sponsorship) was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament that took place between 14 and 21 January 2018 in London, England, and the second Triple Crown event of the 2017â€“18 snooker season. It was the 44th staging of the Masters, and was broadcast in Europe by the BBC and Eurosport.
